Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class CCq

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CCq
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class CCq
extends ProblemTransformationMethod
implements weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    The Classifier Chains Method - Random Subspace ('quick') Version. This version is able to downsample the number of training instances across the binary models.
    See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. Machine Learning Journal. Springer. Vol. 85(3), pp 333-359. (May 2011).
    Version:
    January 2009
    Author:
    Jesse Read (jesse@tsc.uc3m.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
